game.name: Train Simulator: DB BR 440 ‘Coradia Continental’ Loco Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Expand your collection of modern German passenger trains with the introduction of the DB BR 440 to Train Simulator.The DB BR 440, or Coradia Continental is a family of high speed commuter trains designed for S-Bahn services throughout Germany.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Expand your collection of modern German passenger trains with the introduction of the DB BR 440 to Train Simulator.The DB BR 440, or Coradia Continental is a family of high speed commuter trains designed for S-Bahn services throughout Germany.
